attributes.action: Review the operation of the rail network in the uk, its ownership and its realationship with its customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Uk's unique rail transport model, many operators offering services in small network parcels, usually without competition, is an abject failure, the government must consider
1.National ownership through Regional Companies
2.A national "Per Mile" Price standard
3.Ticket Pricing directly related to actual performance, measured at both peak and off-peak times, with the price of weekly and longer season tickets based on actual performance at peak times, all other ticket prices based on off peak performance levels
4. A significant share of nett profits returned to operating staff at all levels in a performance related incentive scheme
5. An interim windfall tax of 100% of nett profits on operating Companies whose overall performance level is below 97.5% of target
